text: 3:8 Jeremaia 9:23-24; 1 Korin 2:2; Kolosi 2:2Kɨ Judan bizibara mɨgeir pu. Puvatɨ. Kɨ Krais Iesus gɨfo a nan Ekiam, ezɨ kɨ fofozir kam gɨnɨghnɨgha ghaze, a guizbangɨn bizim, ezɨ nguazir kamɨn biziba bar pura mɨneghmɨnezir kɨniba. Kɨ Kraisra gɨn mangasa ifonge.
